CE-IVD marked

NovaLisa® SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19)

The Gold Standard Diagnostics Group is excited to collaborate in the fight against COVID-19 with 4 new serological tests for the diagnosis of Coronavirus SARS-CoV-2: IgA, IgM, IgG, and quantitative IgG.

more information

Product Lines

Product Line

NovaLisa

IVD ELISA Test kits focused on infectious diseases: virology, bacteriology, parasites, worms and fungi

more

Product Line

RT-PCR

Real Time PCR

more

Product Line

NovaLine

Analytical technique used to detect reactivity against specific antigens. Focused on infectious diseases

more

VetLine

Diagnostic assays for companion animals and Livestock

  • NovaGen

column8:
GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test for professional use

The new Antigen Rapid Test assay from the Gold Standard Diagnostics Group is a rapid chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2 Nucleocapsid (N) Protein antigens present in respiratory samples.

column1:
Assay Features

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Easy specimen collection: nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs
  • Fast results in 15 minutes
  • Intuitive visual interpretation
  • High sensitivity and specificity
  • Easy to perform: no special equipment needed
  • CE-IVD 


GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab) for self testing

The GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab) is a single-use test kit intended to detect the presence of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, with self-collected nasal swab specimen from symptomatic individuals who are suspected of being infected with COVID-19. A positive result indicates SARS-CoV-2 antigens present in the specimen.

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Self-testing format for a high degree of privacy
  • Easy nasal swab specimen collection
  • Fast results in 15 minutes
  • Easy visual interpretation
  • Simple operation, no equipment required
  • Sensitivity: 96.6% / Specificity: 99.4% / Accuracy: 98.2%
  • CE-IVD

column3: VetLine - Diagnostic Assays for Pets and Livestock

column8: The diagnostic market for veterinary is, currently, one of the most attractive markets in all diagnostic areas. No other niche market has as much potential and upside.

column1: Regular wellness testing enables the veterinarian to evaluate a pet’s general health and become aware of any health problems before they become serious illnesses. Establish your position today by entering this new market full of opportunities and with consistent growth.

NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH has developed ELISA assays for the detection of pathogen-specific antigens or antibodies. We are using the advantages of a protein A/G-HRP conjugate. This protein is able to detect antibodies from all mammals and is consequently suited for veterinary serological assays.

We have an R&D team dedicated to the development of new diagnostic tests for animals. Having said that, please feel free to approach us with your specific needs and demands for this market. We are always looking for new ideas and therefore welcome your input. Our main goal is to develop tests which will meet the current market needs and demands.
Please contact us for specific product information

column3: Advantages of the VetLine ELISA Kits

column8:
• Ready to use reagents
  • Standardized procedures
  • EIAs with cut off control
  • Color coded reagents
  • Easy to use on automated systems
  • Snap-off microtiter strips
  • Long shelf-life
  • Type of samples vary depending on the assay: serum, plasma, urine, milk
  • Pooled samples

column1: Please contact us for specific product information

column8:
For Diagnostic Use

  • Anaplasma
  • Borrelia
  • Brucella*
  • Coxiella (bovine)*
  • Feline Leukemia Virus (FeLV) Antigen
  • Feline Corona Virus (FCoV/FIP)
  • Feline Immunodeficiency Virus (FIV)
  • Leishmania
  • Leptospira*
  • Canine Distemper Virus (CDV)
  • Canine Parvovirus (CPV)
  • Riemerella
  • TBE/FSME
  • Toxoplasma**
  • Trichinella

* No FLI Registration - not available for the German market
** Registered by the FLI

column1:
For Research Use Only

  • Babesia
  • Coxiella Phase 1*
  • Coxiella Phase 2*
  • Dirofilaria Antigen
  • Echinococcus*
  • Ehrlichia
  • Feline Calicivirus (FCV)
  • Feline Parvovirus (FPV)
  • Giardia Antigen
  • Leptospira IgM*
  • TBE/FSME IgM
  • Toxocara
  • Toxoplasma IgM*

column2:
• Home
  • Products
  • RT-PCR

column8: M371-Test is a qPCR-based assay intended as an aid for primary diagnosis and follow-up monitoring of testicular germ cell tumors (TGCT). It measures the relative quantity of the tumor marker miR-371a-3p from a blood sample with outstanding diagnostic accuracy.

column1: The Mplex Monkeypox, Orthopox  is a new multiplex Real-time PCR assay for the detection of the monkeypox virus and its differentiation from other orthopox viruses.

The Mplex SARS-CoV-2+, Flu A, Flu B (C1) RT-PCR assay allows to differentiate in a single reaction between Influenza A and B, and simultaneously detects two independent gene targets in SARS-CoV-2 (N-gene + RdRP-gene).
The RSV A, RSV B RT-PCR assay is capable of differentiating between respiratory syncytial virus A and B.
The GSD NovaType Detect + Select K417N SARS-CoV-2 is designed for the SARS-CoV-2 screening and identification of the Omicron variant.

The GSD NovaType IV SARS-CoV-2 is a CE marked, rapid and reliable RT-PCR assay for the differentiation of Omicron from other VOCs (Beta, Gamma, and Delta). It specifically identifies S gene mutations K417N, E484K, and L452R.

The GSD NovaPrime® TSP SARS-CoV-2 is intended for the qualitative determination of SARS-CoV-2 genomic RNA in several respiratory sample types to aid in the diagnosis of COVID-19. This product represents an improvement in comparison to its former version GSD NovaPrime® SARS-CoV-2.

column1: <input type=""search"" class=""c-search__field"" id=""search-input"" value="""" name=""q"" placeholder=""Search"" data-mmenu-searchform-input />

• Home
  • COVID-19
  • Serology

The ELISAs SARS-CoV-2 IgG and IgA are intended for the qualitative detection of IgG and IgA  antibodies to SARS-CoV-2 virus in human serum to aid in the diagnosis of Coronavirus (COVID-19). The assays are an ideal supplement for direct pathogen detection and are a valuable tool for epidemiological studies.

  • SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgA – Prod. No.: COVA0940 
  • SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG – Prod. No.: COVG0940

Assay Features

  • Separate Detection of IgG and IgA Antibodies
  • Total incubation under 2 hours
  • Ready to use controls
  • Assay procedure is easy to automate

SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Quantitative IgG

The ELISA SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) quantitative IgG is an immunoassay for the quantitative and qualitative detection of specific IgG-class antibodies to the spike protein of SARS-CoV-2. It is intended to aid in the diagnosis of patients suspected of having COVID-19 disease or asymptomatic presentation of SARS-CoV-2, to monitor antibody levels during and after a COVID-19 infection, and to determine antibody levels before and after a COVID-19 vaccination.

  • SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) quantitative IgG – Prod. No.: CVGQ0970

Assay Features

  • Quantitative determination of antibodies to the SARS-CoV-2 spike (S) protein
  • Trimeric SARS-CoV-2 Spike antigen
  • Intended as an aid to evaluate patients immune status and determine vaccine efficacy
  • Calibrators correlate to First WHO International Standards for SARS-CoV-2
  • Diagnostic specificity and sensitivity of 99.49% and 100% (>15 days post symptom onset) respectively
  • Validated for serum, plasma, and finger prick (serum from capillary blood) samples
  • CE-IVD

  • Privacy Policy
  • General Terms and Conditions

column2:
• Home
  • Products
  • Hormones

column8: Hormones are chemicals released by cells that affect other cells in different parts of the human body. Only a small amount of hormones is required to alter one's cell metabolism. It also has a function of a messenger, having the ability to transport signals between cells. Hormones in animals are often transported through the blood stream.

column1: Many processes in the body are coordinated by hormones which regulate and balance the working of organs and cells. Some hormones have long term effects, for example, the hormones that control how we grow and the changes that happen at puberty. Other hormones have shorter term effects. Too much, or too little of a hormone can cause several health problems to an individual and it can ultimately result in different illnesses.
Having said that, keeping track of one's hormones can help finding explanations for different health concerns and even allow the proper treatment for a specific condition or disease.

With that in mind, we have developed a line of products using our ELISA technique to determine the diagnosis of several different health issues related to abnormal hormone levels. Cells respond to a hormone when they express a specific receptor for that hormone. The hormone binds to the receptor protein, resulting in the activation of a signal transduction mechanism that ultimately leads to cell type-specific responses.

ELISA is based on the ability of low molecular weight antibodies to couple with enzymes, to produce enzymatically active immunological conjugates. This allows the detection of immune reaction with histochemical staining techniques, because the antibody component is involved in immune reaction and the conjugated enzyme can be used for staining reaction utilizing appropriate substrate.

column3: Gold Standard Diagnostics Group To Aid in the Fight Against COVID-19 Pandemic

column8: The Gold Standard Diagnostics Group, including Gold Standard Diagnostics Inc, NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH, and VIROTECH Diagnostics GmbH, is a group of specialized diagnostic technologies companies known as well-established providers of innovative solutions in infectious disease testing, immunology and automation.

column1: Immunoassays for Diagnostic of Exposure to COVID-19

We offer multiple immunoassays for antibody detection to SARS-CoV-2 with very good sensitivity and specificity. Antibodies testing provide information about past exposure to SARS-CoV-2. It may provide information about statistically reduced contagion risks of and from these persons. It could help identify donors of plasma from recovered patients that can be transfused into COVID-19 patients as a potential treatment. It can be used for serosurveys to evaluate the percentage of the population exposed to the virus.
For detailed product information, please visit the http://www.goldstandarddiagnostics.com/ page.

• Home
  • COVID-19
  • RT-PCR

column8: Molecular detection is established as the primary and more accurate method for direct detection of SARS-CoV-2 in the early stages of infection. The real-time reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) is highly sensitive and specific, and can deliver a reliable result quickly.

column1:
The GSD NovaType Detect + Select K417N SARS-CoV-2 is designed for the SARS-CoV-2 screening and identification of the Omicron variant.  

  • GSD NovaType Detect + Select K417N SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6181 - 1 x 96 reactions
  • GSD NovaType Detect + Select K417N SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6184 - 4 x 96 reactions

Assay Features

  • Identification of SARS-CoV-2 N gene (N1/N2) and mutation K417N in one reaction
  • Specimen types: nasal wash/swab, nasopharyngeal swab, oropharyngeal swab
  • Validated PCR platforms: AriaMxTM, AriaDxTM (Agilent Technologies)
  • RUO

The GSD NovaPrime® TSP SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) is intended for the qualitative determination of SARS-CoV-2 genomic RNA in several respiratory sample types to aid in the diagnosis of COVID-19. This product represents an improvement in comparison to its former version GSD NovaPrime® SARS-CoV-2.

  • GSD NovaPrime® TSP SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6111 - 1 x 96 reactions
  • GSD NovaPrime® TSP SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6113 - 3 x 96 reactions

Assay Features

  • Specimen types: nasopharyngeal swab, nasal wash/swab, oropharyngeal swab, saliva, gargling solution
  • Less sample volume required
  • Extraction/inhibition and positive control included
  • Approximately 1 hour turnaround time
  • Excellent performance with higher sensitivity
  • CE-IVD marked

 
GSD NovaType IV SARS-CoV-2

The GSD NovaType IV SARS-CoV-2 is a CE marked, rapid and reliable RT-PCR assay for the differentiation of Omicron from other VOCs (Beta, Gamma, and Delta). It specifically identifies S gene mutations K417N, E484K, and L452R.

GSD NovaType IV SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6191T - 1 x 96 reactions
GSD NovaType IV SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6194T - 4 x 96 reactions

Assay Features

  • Parallel detection of S gene mutations L452R, E484K, and K417N, and discrimination of these mutations from the wildtype sequence at S gene position E484
  • Specimen types: nasal, nasopharyngeal, oropharyngeal
  • Should be performed after a first screening for SARS-CoV-2 RNA with a CE-IVD marked assay such as the GSD NovaPrime® TSP SARS-CoV-2 RT-PCR kit
  • Validated PCR platforms: AriaMx™, AriaDx™ (Agilent Technologies), CFX96 Touch™ (Bio-Rad)
  • Fast and reliable results within 1 hour
  • CE-IVD
Visit our FAQ page for more details on the PCR assay.

column2:
• Home
  • Products
  • ELISA

column8:
NovaLisa is our line of IVD ELISA Kits for the human market. We offer a wide range of products with focus on Infectious Diseases:

  • Virology
  • Bacteriology
  • Parasites
  • Worms
  • Fungi

All our reagents are ready to use and very user friendly. Most of our kits have the same protocol, incubation time and common reagents, making them very easy to be used on different automation systems. Please contact us to get a list of the fully automated system in which our products have been adapted and their respective protocols.

• CE Approved
  • Ready to use reagents
  • Standardized procedures
  • Special IgM-buffer to avoid interference with rheumatoid factors
  • EIAs with cut off control
  • Color coded reagents
  • Quality Control (QC) performed manually as well as on several automated systems
  • Long shelf-life
  • Snap-off microtiter strips
  • Ready to use on several automated systems
  • Flexible packaging - 48 or 96 wells

column3: GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test for professional use

column8: The GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test completes the diagnostic panel of the Gold Standard Diagnostics Group for SARS-CoV-2 diagnostics: ELISA, RT-PCR, and RNA Extraction kits. This lateral-flow test meets the WHO performance criteria (sensitivity higher than 80%; specificity higher than 97%) for use in the global fight against COVID-19.

column1: The GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test is intended for the qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2 Nucleocapsid (N) Protein antigens present in respiratory samples.

GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test

  • GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (NP swab) - CVAG4080A - 20 tests
  • GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal swab) - CVAG4080B - 20 tests

Assay Features

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Easy specimen collection: nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs
  • Fast results in 15 minutes
  • Intuitive visual interpretation
  • High sensitivity and specificity
  • Easy to perform: no special equipment needed
  • CE-IVD marked
GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal swab) for self testing

The GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab) is a single-use test kit intended to detect the presence of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, with self-collected nasal swab specimen from symptomatic individuals who are suspected of being infected with COVID-19. A positive result indicates SARS-CoV-2 antigens present in the specimen.

  • GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal swab) - Prod. No.: CVAG502H05 - 5 tests


Assay Features

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Self-testing format for a high degree of privacy
  • Easy nasal swab specimen collection
  • Fast results in 15 minutes assay time
  • Easy visual interpretation
  • Simple operation, no equipment required
  • Sensitivity: 96.6% / Specificity: 99.4% / Accuracy: 98.2%
  • CE-IVD

  • Legal Notice
  • Privacy Policy
  • General Terms and Conditions

• Home
  • Products

column3: IVD kits for Human and Veterinary Markets

column8: NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH started out by developing and manufacturing ELISA products for the diagnosis of infectious diseases (NovaLisa)

column1: Over the years, in order to meet the needs and demands of our customers, we found the need to expand our product line outside of the infectious diseases field of expertise.

With that in mind, we started to add new areas of diagnosis into our existing ELISA line. Such as: steroid, protein and thyroid hormones; tumor markers; diabetes monitoring; and circulating immuno complexes.
More recently we have expanded into new areas such as the veterinary and Line blots arena.

We are a very customer oriented company, which drives us to find the right combination of products which give our partners the ability to remain competitors and to meet the challenging needs of their own customers.

column11: GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test
Mplex SARS-CoV-2+, Flu A, Flu B (C1) RT-PCR
GSD NovaType Detect + Select K417N SARS-CoV-2
GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab for Self Testing)

column8: The Gold Standard Diagnostics Group, including Gold Standard Diagnostics Inc, NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH, and VIROTECH Diagnostics GmbH, is a group of specialized diagnostic technologies companies known as well-established providers of innovative solutions in infectious disease testing, immunology and automation.

column1: The instrument catalogue is composed by an innovative suite of platforms that will improve your laboratory efficienty and consistency, and minimize overall costs.
For detailed product information, please visit the http://www.gsdx.us page.

column1: Enter your username and password here in order to log in on the website:
<form class=""o-form"" action=""/login.html"" target=""_top"" method=""post"" onsubmit=""; return true;"">

column3: <input  class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text""   placeholder=""Please enter your email address"" type=""text"" id=""user"" name=""user"" value="""" />
<input  class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text"" placeholder=""Please enter your password""  type=""password"" id=""pass"" name=""pass"" value="""" data-rsa-encryption="""" />

column9: <button type=""submit"" name=""submit"" class=""o-btn   u-icon u-icon--before u-icon--login   o-btn--blue"">

column1: <legend>Please complete the information for your membership.</legend>

column3: <input class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text"" id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-password"" placeholder=""Please enter your password"" type=""password"" size=""10"" maxlength=""100"" title=""Enter the password you want to use to login."" name=""pass"" data-rsa-encryption="""" value="""" class=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-password""  />

<input class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text"" id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-password_again"" placeholder=""Please enter your password again""type=""password"" size=""10"" maxlength=""100"" title=""Enter the same password a second time."" name=""FE[fe_users][password_again]"" data-rsa-encryption="""" value="""" class=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-password"" />

<input id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-first_name"" type=""text"" class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text"" placeholder=""Please enter your first name"" size=""40"" maxlength=""50"" title=""Enter your first name."" name=""FE[fe_users][first_name]"" />

<input id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-last_name"" type=""text"" class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text"" size=""40"" placeholder=""Please enter your last name"" maxlength=""50"" title=""Enter your surname."" name=""FE[fe_users][last_name]"" />

<input id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-company"" type=""text"" class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text""placeholder=""Please enter your company"" size=""40"" maxlength=""50"" title=""Enter the name of your company or organization."" name=""FE[fe_users][company]"" />

<select size=""1"" id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-static_info_country"" name=""FE[fe_users][static_info_country]"" title=""Select your country in the list."" onchange=""this.form['tx_srfeuserregister_pi1[countryChange]'].value = 1; this.form.submit();"" >

column1: <option value=""SHN"">Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan da Cunha</option>
<option value=""SGS"">South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands</option>

column3: <input id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-email"" placeholder=""Please enter your email address"" type=""text"" class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text"" size=""40"" maxlength=""255"" title=""Enter your email address."" name=""FE[fe_users][email]"" />

column4: <button type=""submit"" name=""tx_srfeuserregister_pi1[submit]""  class=""o-btn   u-icon u-icon--before u-icon--signup   o-btn--blue"">

• Home
  • Instruments
  • ThunderBolt

column8: The ThunderBolt is an innovative 2-plate, fully automated, open platform that is compact and cost efficient. The user friendly and flexible software is capable of programming a broad range of protocols. The ThunderBolt is available for both ELISA and Chemiluminescent (CLIA) applications.

column1:
Main features:

  • Slide-in racks with positive sample identification
  • Simple workflow software that guides you through the process
  • Designed to suit different laboratory demands
  • High sample loading capacity: 192 primary sample tubes
  • Capable of running many different protocols in a single batch
  • On-board camera allows remote troubleshooting
  • No disposable tips, minimal consumables, direct in-well dilution (up to 1:100)
  • Occupies minimal bench space

Legal Manufacturer: Gold Standard Diagnostics Corp.

• Imprint
  • Legal Notice
  • Privacy Policy
  • General Terms and Conditions

column8: A one-plate ELISA+CLIA processor, the Bolt shares many features of the ThunderBolt, but with a more customizable, lower throughput, cost-effective design.

column1:
Main features:

  • Modular design
  • 96 Sample Capacity
  • Intuitive User Interface
  • No disposable tips, minimal consumables, direct in-well dilution (up to 1:100)
  • Occupies minimal bench space

Legal Manufacturer: Gold Standard Diagnostics Corp.

• Imprint
  • Legal Notice
  • Privacy Policy

  • Instruments
  • AIX1000

column8: The AIX1000 is an FDA cleared, fully automated system for nontreponemal, rapid plasma reagin (RPR) testing. It has been designed to simplify the processing, analysis, result interpretation, and archiving for RPR screens and semi-quantitative titers.

column1:
Main features:

  • RPR screens & titers
  • Up to 192 results in 90 minutes
  • Full sample traceability: positive specimen ID/Tracking
  • Proprietary image recognition algorithm gives objective results
  • Reduced labor overhead: reduced TAT and hands on
  • Easy access to test results: save data and review on demand

Legal Manufacturer: Gold Standard Diagnostics Corp.

column3: History - Standing the Test of Time

column8: NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH is a medium-sized, ISO certified company, located in Dietzenbach near the Frankfurt International Airport.

column1: NovaTec Immundiagnostica is mainly engaged in the development and manufacturing of ELISA diagnostic kits for both human and veterinary markets. Our main area of focus is infectious diseases. Our kits are used for diagnosis of bacterial, viral and parasitic diseases. NovaTec Immundiagnostica works together with well-known national and international diagnostic companies. Worldwide sales of NovaTec Immundiagnostica products are performed by well-known diagnostic companies and in cooperation with national distributors in over 60 countries.

Production and warehouse have been enlarged, making it possible to produce new assays for our current lines as well as enter into new areas of expertise such as western blots, tumor markers and veterinary.

Advantages of our products are standardized working steps, ready-to-use, color-coded and bar-coded reagents, snap-off microtiter strips and a special IgM buffer to avoid interferences with rheumatoid factor in the specimen.

All ELISA tests have a shelf-life of 15 months after production and can be used manually as well as in fully automated systems. All boxes are recyclable and are shipped within a few days after intake of order.

column3: The right way to do business

column8: Running a business on a day to day presents many challenges and one of them is the challenge to discern what's right from what's wrong; what's good for the long term objective of the company and what's just a short term profit.

column1: Our business claim is "Standing the Test of Time", which shows that our goal, as a  business and a partner is to be here for the long haul. We want to be a solid, reliable and consistent source of products for our business partners. Therefore our decision making process, on a day to day, never deviates from this main goal and its core idea.

Our partners can count on us to keep delivering what we promise, and to keep meeting their needs and demands over and over. NovaTec Immundiagnostica will continue to stay in business, standing the test of time, overcoming the challenges and innovating the market.

We continue to expand our facilities. We moved our corporate office into a new building, right next to our laboratory facility. The new space gives us the ability to continue to expand and to hire new personal to better assist the needs and demands of our customers and of our market.
We believe this new team will give us the edge we need to get to our next level as a company.

NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH started out as a family business where everyone's opinion matter. The company has grown and expanded beyond the family walls, however it has not changed its corporate philosophy. Everyone matters, everyone contributes, everyone grows...

Our management team works very closely with all our staff, from product development all the way through production, marketing, customer service and product delivery. Our goal is to provide immediate responses to our customers needs and demands.

Our management structure is very horizontal, which gives us the ability to act quickly and to make decisions in a timely manner. That allows us to work closely with our partners in a flexible and proactive way.

column8: NovaTec Immundiagnostica has a certified Quality Management System according to  DIN EN ISO 13485. An annual audit is implemented by mdc. All products made by NovaTec are CE-marked and fulfill all the requirements of the IVD guideline of the European Union 98/79/EC of Oct. 27th 1998.

column1: We pride ourselves to keep the highest level of internal quality assurance so our customers can have piece of mind when ordering our products.

We strongly believe that in order to have a quality product one must have quality people working behind it and that's exactly what we strive on. Our staff consists of very qualified and experienced professionals who focus on delivering high quality products to the end user.

As always, we continue to participate in Ringtrail studies such as INSTAND and NEQAS. Those studies are part of our overall Quality Control Protocol and gives our customers an extra assurance that our products are in accordance with the quality standards of well known and respected institutions such as the ones above.

column8: Today's economy presents many obstacles and challenges for one to run a successful business. The World is only getting smaller and the globalization process of our economy is shrinking the boarders and presenting new challenges everyday.

column1: Growing a business isn't easy and without the right partners it becomes impossible. Each market presents its own challenges and uniquenesses. Trying to penetrate a market without the expertise and knowledge of a local partner is dangerous and ineffective. In order to remain competitive and to keep the same level of great customer service and product quality, NovaTec Immundiagnostica relies on its local partners to reach the global market.

We believe that a strong partnership is the secret for a successful strategy to grow a business and to meet the needs and demands of the end users. We have been developing partnerships for several years and so far we have been blessed by finding right partners and we are very pleased with the accomplishments of our distributors. Without their help we would not be able to successfully reach our goals.

For many years we have been working together with worldwide market leaders such as Siemens and DiaSorin. We also have a long list of local partners representing our products in most countries around the world. Please contact us in case you are interested in becoming one of our partners or if you need the contact information for our partner in your country.

column1: <input type=""search"" class=""c-search__field"" id=""search-input"" value="""" name=""q"" placeholder=""Search"" data-mmenu-searchform-input />

• Home
  • Company
  • Training

We have set ambitious goals for ourselves for the near future, which we can only achieve with your help. Having said that we would like to extend an invitation to our partners to visit our facility and spend some time with us in Germany.

We highly recommend that you take part in one of our training programs in our facilities in Dietzenbach. Here we can offer some lab training to make you more familiar with our tests and to show you our latest developments straight from our R&D labs. 

We believe this is very important for the development and maintenance of a healthy and up to date business relationship. It would be pleasure to have you here to show you our facility and to discuss new ways to improve our cooperation.

We will also discuss ways in which we can assist you to expand your market share within your existing customers as well as new ones. Furthermore, this is a great opportunity for us to learn more about your territory and the difficulties you have to overcome.  From our experience we know that if we concentrate on product training and a detailed discussion about the advantages of our products this will help you to sell our products in your regional markets much better.
 
Please contact us in order to make the necessary arrangements for the trip depending on your availability and needs. We hope the training sessions will fit into your time schedule and we are waiting for your early reply.

column8:
We are present in more than 85 countries with leading diagnostics solutions. The contacts below can help you with specific information.

  • Order Processing: order(at)goldstandarddiagnostics.eu
  • Technical Support: productsupport(at)goldstandarddiagnostics.eu
  • Marketing: marketing(at)goldstandarddiagnostics.eu
  • Purchase: purchase(at)goldstandarddiagnostics.eu
  • Logistics: logistics(at)goldstandarddiagnostics.eu   
  • General Information: info(at)goldstandarddiagnostics.eu

Please notice that our email address domain is now @goldstandarddiagnostics.eu:
i.e. max.mustermann@goldstandarddiagnostics.eu / john.doe@goldstandarddiagnostics.eu

  • SARS-CoV-2 - PCR

column1: Severe Acute Respiratory Syndrome Coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) is the name of the new pathogen identified in China at the end of 2019. It belongs to a large family of single-stranded RNA viruses, known for causing respiratory, enteric, hepatic, and neurological diseases in different animal species. To date, seven coronaviruses are known to be capable of infecting humans and causing respiratory infections, SARS-CoV, SARS-CoV-2, and MERS-CoV showing the more severe clinical symptoms.

COVID-19 is the official name for the new infectious disease declared pandemic in March 2020. It is a zoonotic disease that has quickly spread globally from person-to-person via respiratory droplets or through touching contaminated objects or surfa

It can present as an asymptomatic infection, a mild respiratory tract infection, or a severe pneumonia with respiratory failure and even death. The incubation period ranges from 2-14 days (5 days on average), and symptoms can include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
Primarily transmitted between people through respiratory droplets and contact routes
• Mplex SARS-CoV-2+, Flu A, Flu B (C1) RT-PCR
• GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab for Self Testing)

column8:
GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test for professional use

The new Antigen Rapid Test assay from the Gold Standard Diagnostics Group is a rapid chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2 Nucleocapsid (N) Protein antigens present in respiratory samples.

column1:
Assay Features

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Easy specimen collection: nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs
  • Fast results in 15 minutes
  • Intuitive visual interpretation
  • High sensitivity and specificity
  • Easy to perform: no special equipment needed
  • CE-IVD 


GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab) for self testing

The GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab) is a single-use test kit intended to detect the presence of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, with self-collected nasal swab specimen from symptomatic individuals who are suspected of being infected with COVID-19. A positive result indicates SARS-CoV-2 antigens present in the specimen.

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Self-testing format for a high degree of privacy
  • Easy nasal swab specimen collection
  • Fast results in 15 minutes
  • Easy visual interpretation
  • Simple operation, no equipment required
  • Sensitivity: 96.6% / Specificity: 99.4% / Accuracy: 98.2%
  • CE-IVD

column1: <input type=""search"" class=""c-search__field"" id=""search-input"" value="""" name=""q"" placeholder=""Search"" data-mmenu-searchform-input />

CE-IVD marked

NovaLisa® SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19)

The Gold Standard Diagnostics Group is excited to collaborate in the fight against COVID-19 with 4 new serological tests for the diagnosis of Coronavirus SARS-CoV-2: IgA, IgM, IgG, and quantitative IgG.

more information

Product Lines

Product Line

NovaLisa

IVD ELISA Test kits focused on infectious diseases: virology, bacteriology, parasites, worms and fungi

more

Product Line

RT-PCR

Real Time PCR

more

Product Line

NovaLine

Analytical technique used to detect reactivity against specific antigens. Focused on infectious diseases

more

Product Line

VetLine

Diagnostic assays for companion animals and Livestock

more

column2:
• Home
  • Virology

column9: Virology is the study of viruses and virus-like agents: their structure, classification and evolution, their ways to infect and exploit cells for virus reproduction, the diseases they cause, the techniques to isolate and culture them, and their use in research and therapy.

column1: One of the main reason to study viruses is the fact that they cause many important infectious diseases, among them the common cold, influenza, rabies, measles, many forms of diarrhea, hepatitis, yellow fever, polio, smallpox etc...

column2:
• Home
  • NovaLisa - Infectious Diseases - ELISA Test Kits

column9:
NovaTec Immundiagnostica has always been focused on the infectious diseases market. We have over 120 products to help with the diagnosis of different infectious diseases. NovaTec has become a reference in the IVD market for Infectious Diseases.

  • Virology
  • Bacteriology
  • Parasites
  • Worms
  • Fungi
  • Avidity

Together with the list of products available, the company also grew substantially and developed its own set of advantages:

  • CE Approved
  • Standardized methods
  • Ready-to-use reagents
  • Special IgM buffer to avoid interferences with RF
  • Color-coded reagents
  • EIA with cut-off controls
  • Snap-off microtiter strips
  • QC performed manually as well as on several automated systems
  • Long Shelf Life
  • Ready to use on several automated analyzers
  • Flexible packaging

ELISA is the backbone technology used in the majority of our products, however we continue to expand our portfolio. We are also working with LineBlots, Chemiluminescense and RealTime PCR techonologies.

column1: <input type=""search"" class=""c-search__field"" id=""search-input"" value="""" name=""q"" placeholder=""Search"" data-mmenu-searchform-input />
GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test

column2:
• Home
  • Products
  • RT-PCR
  • NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Antigen Rapid Test

column1:
The Antigen Rapid Test assay from the Gold Standard Diagnostics Group is a rapid chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2 Nucleocapsid (N) Protein antigens present in respiratory samples. 

  • GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (NP swab) - Prod. No.: CVAG4080A - 20 tests
  • GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal swab) - Prod. No.: CVAG4080B - 20 tests

Assay Features

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Easy specimen collection: nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs
  • Fast results in 15 minutes
  • Intuitive visual interpretation
  • High sensitivity and specificity
  • Easy to perform: no special equipment needed
  • CE-IVD marked

COVID-19 is the official name for the new infectious disease declared pandemic in March 2020. It is a zoonotic disease that has quickly spread globally from person-to-person via respiratory droplets or through touching contaminated objects or surfa

It can present as an asymptomatic infection, a mild respiratory tract infection, or a severe pneumonia with respiratory failure and even death. The incubation period ranges from 2-14 days (5 days on average), and symptoms can include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
Primarily transmitted between people through respiratory droplets and contact routes

Nasopharyngeal Swab:
Diagnostic Sensitivity: 93.40%
Diagnostic Specificity: 99.90%
Accuracy 99.60%

Nasal Swab:
Diagnostic Sensitivity 97.40%
Diagnostic Specificity 99.90%
Accuracy 99.00%

Test procedure: After sample collection, insert the swab into the tube containing the buffer solution. Rotate the swab for one minute and close the lid. Use the dropper to transfer 3 drops (approximately 100 μL) of the specimen with reagent to the specimen well (S) of the cassette, and start the timer.
IFU CVAG4080A CVAG4080B EN DE IT (pdf, 652 KB)
Brochure GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 EN (pdf, 1 MB)
Brochure GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 DE (pdf, 1 MB)
Brochure GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 FR (pdf, 1 MB)
Brochure GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 PT (pdf, 1 MB)
Brochure GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 ES (pdf, 1 MB)
Brochure GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 FI (pdf, 1 MB)
GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test
In case you would like to place an order for one of our products please contact our customer service department or click here.

column1: <input type=""search"" class=""c-search__field"" id=""search-input"" value="""" name=""q"" placeholder=""Search"" data-mmenu-searchform-input />
GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab for Self Testing)

column2:
• Home
  • Products
  • RT-PCR
  • GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab for Self Testing)

column1:
The GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab) is a single-use test kit intended to detect the presence of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, with self-collected nasal swab specimen from symptomatic individuals who are suspected of being infected with COVID-19. A positive result indicates SARS-CoV-2 antigens present in the specimen.

GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal swab) - Prod. No.: CVAG502H05 - 5 tests

Assay Features

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Self-testing format for a high degree of privacy
  • Easy nasal swab specimen collection
  • Fast results in 15 minutes assay time
  • Easy visual interpretation
  • Simple operation, no equipment required
  • Sensitivity: 96.6% / Specificity: 99.4% / Accuracy: 98.2%
  • CE-IVD

COVID-19 is the official name for the new infectious disease declared pandemic in March 2020. It is a zoonotic disease that has quickly spread globally from person-to-person via respiratory droplets or through touching contaminated objects or surfa

It can present as an asymptomatic infection, a mild respiratory tract infection, or a severe pneumonia with respiratory failure and even death. The incubation period ranges from 2-14 days (5 days on average), and symptoms can include fever, cough, and shortness of breath.
Primarily transmitted between people through respiratory droplets and contact routes
IFU GSD Novagen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test in EN-ES-PT-FR-DE-IT (pdf, 967 KB)
IFU GSD Novagen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test in SV-FI-NO-DA-NL-HU (pdf, 1 MB)
GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab for Self Testing)

• Home
  • Privacy Policy

column2:
General

Novatec Immundiagnostica GmbH, Waldstrasse 23 A6, 63128 Dietzenbach, Germany and Virotech Diagnostics GmbH, Waldstrasse 23, 63128 Dietzenbach, Germany  (“we” or “us”) are joint controllers (Art. 26 GDPR) of the website www.novatec-id.com (the “Website”).

We appreciate your interest in our companies and our products. Protecting your personal data is very important to us. In this Privacy Policy, we explain how we collect personal data, what we do with it, for what purposes and on what legal basis we process it and what rights you have (the “Privacy Policy”). 

B.
column3:
Identity and contact details of the controllers

The parties responsible for this Website are:

Novatec Immundiagnostica GmbH
Waldstrasse 23 A6
63128 Dietzenbach
Germany
Phone: +49 6074 23698-0
Email: info@goldstandarddiagnostics.eu

and

Virotech Diagnostics GmbH
Waldstrasse 23 A2
63128 Dietzenbach
Germany
Phone: +49 6074 23698-0
Email: info@goldstandarddiagnostics.eu

C.
column4:
Contact details of the data protection officer

Our data protection officer can be reached at the following contact details:

Manfred Schlitt
Data Protection Officer
Email: dataprotection(at)goldstandarddiagnostics.eu

D.
column5:
Collection and processing of your personal data

I.

column2:
Visit of our Website

Whenever you visit our Website the browser you use automatically sends information to the server of our Website. This information is temporarily stored in a so-called log file. The following information is collected and stored until automated deletion:

•
column5:
time zone difference from Greenwich Mean Time (GMT),

•
column8:
amount of data transferred in each case,

•
column9:
website from which the request originates,

•
column11:
language and version of the browser software,

We process the aforementioned personal data to ensure a smooth connection and user-friendly experience of the website, to ensure network and information security, to evaluate system security and stability, and for administrative purposes. The legal basis for processing the data is Art. 6 para 1 lit. f) GDPR. Our legitimate interest follows from the aforementioned purposes of processing the data. We do not use data to draw conclusions about you as an individual. 

In addition, we use cookies for the website. You can find more details in section H of this Privacy Policy.
 

2.
column12:
Contract performance

For the performance of contracts with you we process the following personal data:

•
column16:
information required to fulfil our contractual obligation

The legal basis for our personal data processing is Art. 6 para 1 lit. b) GDPR. Personal data is processed so as to be able to identify you as our customer and to fulfil our contractual obligations, to correspond with you, to issue invoices and to establish, exercise or defend legal claims.

3.
column17:
Contact form or other contact with us

If you use our contact form offered on our Website or contact us in any other way, the following data is collected by us:

•
column22:
content of your message

All other information is provided voluntarily and is not required for processing the request. The collection of the personal data is based on your consent according to Art. 6 para 1 lit. a) GDPR. You can revoke your consent at any time with effect for the future. To do so, please send us an e-mail using our above-mentioned e-mail address. Revoking your consent has the consequences that we will no longer continue the data processing based on this consent for the future and will delete the data unless there is another legal basis or there are statutory retention obligations. 

4.
column23:
Newsletter

If you would like to receive our newsletter, we require a valid email address as well as information that allows us to verify that you are the owner of the specified email address and that you agree to receive this newsletter. If you subscribe to our newsletter, the following data will be collected, stored and processed by us:

•
column24:
page from which page was request (so-called referrer URL)

•
column25:
date and tome of the request

•
column26:
description of the type of web browser used

•
column27:
IP address of the requesting computer

•
column29:
date and time of registration and confirmation

The personal data from the newsletter is processed for the purpose of sending the newsletter, you consent to the processing of personal data. The legal basis for this is Art. 6 para 1 lit. a) GDPR. You can revoke your consent at any time due future effect of your data and email address as well as their use for sending the newsletter at any time, e.g., through the "unsubscribe" link in the newsletter. 

The data provided when registering for the newsletter will be used to distribute the newsletter until you cancel your subscription when said data will be deleted. Data we have stored for other purposes (e.g. email addresses for the members area) remain unaffected.

5.
column30:
Application

If you apply for a job, we process the following categories of personal data from you:

•
column31:
master data (this includes e.g. name, gender, date of birth),

•
column32:
contact details (this includes e.g. certificates, curriculum vitae),

•
column33:
data on professional development and acquired skills (including e.g. education and training, work experience, additional qualifications)

All personal data is processed exclusively for the following purpose:

•
column34:
initialization, establishment, implementation and termination of the employment relationship,

•
column35:
declarations and declarations based on legal obligations or otherwise permitted by law,

•
column36:
protection and enforcement of our legitimate interests,

•
column37:
Legal basis for the processing of your data is Art. 6 para. 1 sentence 1 lit. b lit. c and lit. f) GDPR. 

If you have provided "special categories of personal data" as defined by Art. 9 GDPR in your application (e.g. a photograph showing your ethnic origin or your eyesight, information on being severely disabled, marital status), this is done on the basis of your consent according to Art. 9 para 2 lit. a) GDPR. However, we would like to evaluate all applicants on the basis of their qualifications only, therefore we kindly ask that such information be omitted from the application if possible.

Your data will only be passed on to companies within the group of companies, unless we are legally obliged to pass on your data to other bodies.

II.
column38:
Transfer of personal data to third parties 

We will not disclose your personal data to third parties, unless

•
column39:
you have given us your consent to this according to Art. 6 para 1 lit. a), Art. 9 para 2 lit a) GDPR

•
column40:
the disclosure is necessary under Art. 6 para 1 lit. f) GDPR in order to establish, exercise or defend legal claims and there is no reason to assume that you have an overriding and legitimate interest in non-disclosure of your personal data,

•
column41:
in the case there is obligation of disclosure according to Art. 6 para 1 sentence 1 lit. c GDPR, or

•
column42:
permissible by law and necessary for the performance of contracts with you pursuant to Art. 6 para 1 lit. b) GDPR.

If we process your personal data in a third country (i.e. outside the European Union (EU) or the European Economic Area (EEA)) or if this is done in the context of using third-party services or disclosing or transferring data to third parties, this is only done to fulfil our (pre-)contractual obligations, on the basis of your consent, due to a legal obligation or on the basis of our legitimate interests. If there are no legal permissions, we only allow data to be processed in a third country if the special requirements of Art. 44 et GDPR are met.

III.
column43:
Storage and Deletion of personal data

Your personal data will be deleted or blocked as soon as the purpose or legal basis for the storage no longer applies.

However, storage may take place beyond the specified time in the event of a (threatened) legal dispute with you or other legal proceedings or if storage is provided for by legal regulations to which we as the responsible party are subject to. If the storage period prescribed by the statutory provisions expires, the personal data will be blocked or deleted unless further storage by us is necessary and there is a legal basis for this.

E.
column44:
What rights do you have regarding your data?

You have the right:

•
column45:
to ask for information about your personal data processed by us (Art. 15 GDPR). You may specifically ask for information as to the purpose of such processing, the categories of personal data concerned, the categories of recipients to whom your personal data has been or is being disclosed and the length of time that it is intended to be kept, as to the existence of a right to amend, delete or limit such processing or raise an objection, the existence of a right of appeal, the origin of your personal data if it has not been obtained from us and as to the existence of automated decision-making, including profiling, and details of any significant information;

•
column46:
to require the rectification without undue delay of inaccurate personal data processed by us or the supplementation of personal data processed by us (Art. 16 GDPR);

•
column47:
to require the erasure of personal data, without undue delay, processed by us unless its processing should be necessary in the exercise of the right of freedom of expression and information, to fulfil a legal requirement, for reasons of public interest or in order to establish, exercise or defend of or defend legal claims (Art. 17 GDPR “right to be forgotten”);

•
column48:
to require a restriction to be put on the processing of your personal data where the accuracy of the personal data is contested by you, processing is unlawful and (at the same time) you oppose the erasure of the personal data or when we no longer need the data but you require it in order to establish, exercise or defend legal claims or where you have filed an objection to processing under Art. 21 GDPR (Art. 18 GDPR);

•
column49:
to receive your personal data that you have provided to us in a structured, commonly used and machine-readable format or to require the data to be transmitted to another data controller (Art. 20 GDPR);

•
column50:
to withdraw your consent at any time (Art. 7 para 3 GDPR). This means that in future we will no longer be allowed to continue with personal data processing to which your consent relates,;

•
column51:
to lodge a complaint with a supervisory authority (Art. 77 GDPR):

Der hessische Beauftragte für Datenschutz und Informationsfreiheit
Gustaf-Stresemann-Ring 1
65189 Wiesbaden
Telephone: +49 611 1408 – 0
E-Mail: poststelle(at)datenschutz.hessen.de

F.
column52:
Right to object

Where your personal data is processed for the purpose of legitimate interests under Art. 6 para 1lit. f) GDPR you have the right under Art. 21 GDPR to object to the processing of your personal data on grounds relating to your particular situation or where the objection is levelled at direct marketing. In the latter case you have a general right to object which will be implemented by us without a particular situation having to be specified.

If you should wish to exercise your right to object or ask for rectification, we kindly ask you to send us an email to the above specified email address.

G.
column53:
Data security

When our website is visited, we use the SSL method (Secure Socket Layer) in conjunction with the highest level of encryption that is supported by your browser. This will generally be 256-bit encryption. If your browser should not support 256-bit encryption we will have recourse to 128-bit v3 technology. You can see whether a particular page of our website is transmitted encrypted from the closed-form display of the key or padlock icon in the bottom status bar of your browser. We also apply appropriate technical and organisational security measures to safeguard your personal data from accidental or deliberate manipulation, complete or partial loss, destruction or access by unauthorised third parties. Our security measures are continually being improved in line with technological progress.

H.
column54:
Cookies

Cookies are small, simple text files that your computer or mobile device stores when you use our website. Because we guarantee your privacy and want to improve the user-friendliness of your visit or visits to our website, we think it is important that you know why we use cookies. By setting cookies you do not have to enter the same information over and over again and can, for example, complete your CV at a later date. They also help us to understand how you use the website and how we can make the website more user-friendly. Cookies (from third parties) are also used for marketing or analysis purposes.

A distinction is made between session cookies, which are deleted as soon as you close your browser, and permanent cookies, which are stored beyond the individual session. With regard to their function, a distinction is made between cookies:

•
column55:
Technical cookies: these are essential to navigate the website, use basic functions and ensure the security of the website; they do not collect information about you for marketing purposes nor do they record which websites you have visited;

•
column56:
Performance cookies: These collect information about how you use our website, which pages you visit and, for example, whether errors occur during use of the website; they do not collect any information that could identify you - all information collected is anonymous and is only used to improve our website and to find out what interests our website users;

•
column57:
Advertising and targeting cookies: These are used to provide the website user with tailored advertising on the website or third party offers and to measure the effectiveness of these offers; Advertising and Targeting Cookies are stored for a maximum of 13 months;

•
column58:
Sharing cookies: These are used to improve the interactivity of our website with other services (e.g. social networks); sharing cookies are stored for a maximum of 13 months.

Any use of cookies that is not technically necessary constitutes personal data processing that is only permitted with the express and active consent of the user in accordance with Art. 6 para 1 lit. a) GDPR. This applies in particular to the use of advertising, targeting or sharing cookies. In addition, we will only pass on the user's personal data processed by cookies to third parties if you have given your express consent in accordance with Art. 6 para 1sentence 1 lit. a) GDPR.

For more information about cookies, we use and how you can manage your cookie settings and disable certain types of tracking, please see our Cookie Policy.

column3: VetLine - Diagnostic Assays for Pets and Livestock

column8: The diagnostic market for veterinary is, currently, one of the most attractive markets in all diagnostic areas. No other niche market has as much potential and upside.

column1: Regular wellness testing enables the veterinarian to evaluate a pet’s general health and become aware of any health problems before they become serious illnesses. Establish your position today by entering this new market full of opportunities and with consistent growth.

NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH has developed ELISA assays for the detection of pathogen-specific antigens or antibodies. We are using the advantages of a protein A/G-HRP conjugate. This protein is able to detect antibodies from all mammals and is consequently suited for veterinary serological assays.

We have an R&D team dedicated to the development of new diagnostic tests for animals. Having said that, please feel free to approach us with your specific needs and demands for this market. We are always looking for new ideas and therefore welcome your input. Our main goal is to develop tests which will meet the current market needs and demands.
Please contact us for specific product information

column3: Advantages of the VetLine ELISA Kits

column8:
• Ready to use reagents
  • Standardized procedures
  • EIAs with cut off control
  • Color coded reagents
  • Easy to use on automated systems
  • Snap-off microtiter strips
  • Long shelf-life
  • Type of samples vary depending on the assay: serum, plasma, urine, milk
  • Pooled samples

column1: Please contact us for specific product information

column8:
For Diagnostic Use

  • Anaplasma
  • Borrelia
  • Brucella*
  • Coxiella (bovine)*
  • Feline Leukemia Virus (FeLV) Antigen
  • Feline Corona Virus (FCoV/FIP)
  • Feline Immunodeficiency Virus (FIV)
  • Leishmania
  • Leptospira*
  • Canine Distemper Virus (CDV)
  • Canine Parvovirus (CPV)
  • Riemerella
  • TBE/FSME
  • Toxoplasma**
  • Trichinella

* No FLI Registration - not available for the German market
** Registered by the FLI

column1:
For Research Use Only

  • Babesia
  • Coxiella Phase 1*
  • Coxiella Phase 2*
  • Dirofilaria Antigen
  • Echinococcus*
  • Ehrlichia
  • Feline Calicivirus (FCV)
  • Feline Parvovirus (FPV)
  • Giardia Antigen
  • Leptospira IgM*
  • TBE/FSME IgM
  • Toxocara
  • Toxoplasma IgM*

column3: <input class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text"" id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-password"" placeholder=""Please enter your password"" type=""password"" size=""10"" maxlength=""100"" title=""Enter the password you want to use to login."" name=""pass"" data-rsa-encryption="""" value="""" class=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-password""  />

<input class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text"" id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-password_again"" placeholder=""Please enter your password again""type=""password"" size=""10"" maxlength=""100"" title=""Enter the same password a second time."" name=""FE[fe_users][password_again]"" data-rsa-encryption="""" value="""" class=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-password"" />

<input id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-first_name"" type=""text"" class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text"" placeholder=""Please enter your first name"" size=""40"" maxlength=""50"" title=""Enter your first name."" name=""FE[fe_users][first_name]"" />

<input id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-last_name"" type=""text"" class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text"" size=""40"" placeholder=""Please enter your last name"" maxlength=""50"" title=""Enter your surname."" name=""FE[fe_users][last_name]"" />

<input id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-company"" type=""text"" class=""o-form__field o-form__field--text""placeholder=""Please enter your company"" size=""40"" maxlength=""50"" title=""Enter the name of your company or organization."" name=""FE[fe_users][company]"" />

<select size=""1"" id=""tx-srfeuserregister-pi1-static_info_country"" name=""FE[fe_users][static_info_country]"" title=""Select your country in the list."" onchange=""this.form['tx_srfeuserregister_pi1[countryChange]'].value = 1; this.form.submit();"" >

column2:
• Home
  • Products
  • RT-PCR

column8: M371-Test is a qPCR-based assay intended as an aid for primary diagnosis and follow-up monitoring of testicular germ cell tumors (TGCT). It measures the relative quantity of the tumor marker miR-371a-3p from a blood sample with outstanding diagnostic accuracy.

column1: The Mplex Monkeypox, Orthopox  is a new multiplex Real-time PCR assay for the detection of the monkeypox virus and its differentiation from other orthopox viruses.

The Mplex SARS-CoV-2+, Flu A, Flu B (C1) RT-PCR assay allows to differentiate in a single reaction between Influenza A and B, and simultaneously detects two independent gene targets in SARS-CoV-2 (N-gene + RdRP-gene).
The RSV A, RSV B RT-PCR assay is capable of differentiating between respiratory syncytial virus A and B.
The GSD NovaType Detect + Select K417N SARS-CoV-2 is designed for the SARS-CoV-2 screening and identification of the Omicron variant.

The GSD NovaType IV SARS-CoV-2 is a CE marked, rapid and reliable RT-PCR assay for the differentiation of Omicron from other VOCs (Beta, Gamma, and Delta). It specifically identifies S gene mutations K417N, E484K, and L452R.

The GSD NovaPrime® TSP SARS-CoV-2 is intended for the qualitative determination of SARS-CoV-2 genomic RNA in several respiratory sample types to aid in the diagnosis of COVID-19. This product represents an improvement in comparison to its former version GSD NovaPrime® SARS-CoV-2.

column8:
GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test for professional use

The new Antigen Rapid Test assay from the Gold Standard Diagnostics Group is a rapid chromatographic immunoassay for the qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2 Nucleocapsid (N) Protein antigens present in respiratory samples.

column1:
Assay Features

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Easy specimen collection: nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs
  • Fast results in 15 minutes
  • Intuitive visual interpretation
  • High sensitivity and specificity
  • Easy to perform: no special equipment needed
  • CE-IVD 


GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab) for self testing

The GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab) is a single-use test kit intended to detect the presence of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, with self-collected nasal swab specimen from symptomatic individuals who are suspected of being infected with COVID-19. A positive result indicates SARS-CoV-2 antigens present in the specimen.

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Self-testing format for a high degree of privacy
  • Easy nasal swab specimen collection
  • Fast results in 15 minutes
  • Easy visual interpretation
  • Simple operation, no equipment required
  • Sensitivity: 96.6% / Specificity: 99.4% / Accuracy: 98.2%
  • CE-IVD

column2:
• Home
  • Products
  • Hormones

column8: Hormones are chemicals released by cells that affect other cells in different parts of the human body. Only a small amount of hormones is required to alter one's cell metabolism. It also has a function of a messenger, having the ability to transport signals between cells. Hormones in animals are often transported through the blood stream.

column1: Many processes in the body are coordinated by hormones which regulate and balance the working of organs and cells. Some hormones have long term effects, for example, the hormones that control how we grow and the changes that happen at puberty. Other hormones have shorter term effects. Too much, or too little of a hormone can cause several health problems to an individual and it can ultimately result in different illnesses.
Having said that, keeping track of one's hormones can help finding explanations for different health concerns and even allow the proper treatment for a specific condition or disease.

With that in mind, we have developed a line of products using our ELISA technique to determine the diagnosis of several different health issues related to abnormal hormone levels. Cells respond to a hormone when they express a specific receptor for that hormone. The hormone binds to the receptor protein, resulting in the activation of a signal transduction mechanism that ultimately leads to cell type-specific responses.

ELISA is based on the ability of low molecular weight antibodies to couple with enzymes, to produce enzymatically active immunological conjugates. This allows the detection of immune reaction with histochemical staining techniques, because the antibody component is involved in immune reaction and the conjugated enzyme can be used for staining reaction utilizing appropriate substrate.

  • COVID-19

column3: Gold Standard Diagnostics Group To Aid in the Fight Against COVID-19 Pandemic

column8: The Gold Standard Diagnostics Group, including Gold Standard Diagnostics Inc, NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH, and VIROTECH Diagnostics GmbH, is a group of specialized diagnostic technologies companies known as well-established providers of innovative solutions in infectious disease testing, immunology and automation.

column1: Immunoassays for Diagnostic of Exposure to COVID-19

We offer multiple immunoassays for antibody detection to SARS-CoV-2 with very good sensitivity and specificity. Antibodies testing provide information about past exposure to SARS-CoV-2. It may provide information about statistically reduced contagion risks of and from these persons. It could help identify donors of plasma from recovered patients that can be transfused into COVID-19 patients as a potential treatment. It can be used for serosurveys to evaluate the percentage of the population exposed to the virus.
For detailed product information, please visit the http://www.goldstandarddiagnostics.com/ page.

column1: <input type=""search"" class=""c-search__field"" id=""search-input"" value="""" name=""q"" placeholder=""Search"" data-mmenu-searchform-input />

• Home
  • COVID-19
  • Serology

The ELISAs SARS-CoV-2 IgG and IgA are intended for the qualitative detection of IgG and IgA  antibodies to SARS-CoV-2 virus in human serum to aid in the diagnosis of Coronavirus (COVID-19). The assays are an ideal supplement for direct pathogen detection and are a valuable tool for epidemiological studies.

  • SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgA – Prod. No.: COVA0940 
  • SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) IgG – Prod. No.: COVG0940

Assay Features

  • Separate Detection of IgG and IgA Antibodies
  • Total incubation under 2 hours
  • Ready to use controls
  • Assay procedure is easy to automate

SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) Quantitative IgG

The ELISA SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) quantitative IgG is an immunoassay for the quantitative and qualitative detection of specific IgG-class antibodies to the spike protein of SARS-CoV-2. It is intended to aid in the diagnosis of patients suspected of having COVID-19 disease or asymptomatic presentation of SARS-CoV-2, to monitor antibody levels during and after a COVID-19 infection, and to determine antibody levels before and after a COVID-19 vaccination.

  • SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) quantitative IgG – Prod. No.: CVGQ0970

Assay Features

  • Quantitative determination of antibodies to the SARS-CoV-2 spike (S) protein
  • Trimeric SARS-CoV-2 Spike antigen
  • Intended as an aid to evaluate patients immune status and determine vaccine efficacy
  • Calibrators correlate to First WHO International Standards for SARS-CoV-2
  • Diagnostic specificity and sensitivity of 99.49% and 100% (>15 days post symptom onset) respectively
  • Validated for serum, plasma, and finger prick (serum from capillary blood) samples
  • CE-IVD

• Imprint
  • Legal Notice
  • Privacy Policy
  • General Terms and Conditions

column8: Molecular detection is established as the primary and more accurate method for direct detection of SARS-CoV-2 in the early stages of infection. The real-time reverse transcriptase polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) is highly sensitive and specific, and can deliver a reliable result quickly.

column1:
The GSD NovaType Detect + Select K417N SARS-CoV-2 is designed for the SARS-CoV-2 screening and identification of the Omicron variant.  

  • GSD NovaType Detect + Select K417N SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6181 - 1 x 96 reactions
  • GSD NovaType Detect + Select K417N SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6184 - 4 x 96 reactions

Assay Features

  • Identification of SARS-CoV-2 N gene (N1/N2) and mutation K417N in one reaction
  • Specimen types: nasal wash/swab, nasopharyngeal swab, oropharyngeal swab
  • Validated PCR platforms: AriaMxTM, AriaDxTM (Agilent Technologies)
  • RUO

The GSD NovaPrime® TSP SARS-CoV-2 (COVID-19) is intended for the qualitative determination of SARS-CoV-2 genomic RNA in several respiratory sample types to aid in the diagnosis of COVID-19. This product represents an improvement in comparison to its former version GSD NovaPrime® SARS-CoV-2.

  • GSD NovaPrime® TSP SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6111 - 1 x 96 reactions
  • GSD NovaPrime® TSP SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6113 - 3 x 96 reactions

Assay Features

  • Specimen types: nasopharyngeal swab, nasal wash/swab, oropharyngeal swab, saliva, gargling solution
  • Less sample volume required
  • Extraction/inhibition and positive control included
  • Approximately 1 hour turnaround time
  • Excellent performance with higher sensitivity
  • CE-IVD marked

 
GSD NovaType IV SARS-CoV-2

The GSD NovaType IV SARS-CoV-2 is a CE marked, rapid and reliable RT-PCR assay for the differentiation of Omicron from other VOCs (Beta, Gamma, and Delta). It specifically identifies S gene mutations K417N, E484K, and L452R.

GSD NovaType IV SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6191T - 1 x 96 reactions
GSD NovaType IV SARS-CoV-2 - Prod. No.: PCOV6194T - 4 x 96 reactions

Assay Features

  • Parallel detection of S gene mutations L452R, E484K, and K417N, and discrimination of these mutations from the wildtype sequence at S gene position E484
  • Specimen types: nasal, nasopharyngeal, oropharyngeal
  • Should be performed after a first screening for SARS-CoV-2 RNA with a CE-IVD marked assay such as the GSD NovaPrime® TSP SARS-CoV-2 RT-PCR kit
  • Validated PCR platforms: AriaMx™, AriaDx™ (Agilent Technologies), CFX96 Touch™ (Bio-Rad)
  • Fast and reliable results within 1 hour
  • CE-IVD
Visit our FAQ page for more details on the PCR assay.

• Imprint
  • Legal Notice
  • Privacy Policy
  • General Terms and Conditions

column3: GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test for professional use

column8: The GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test completes the diagnostic panel of the Gold Standard Diagnostics Group for SARS-CoV-2 diagnostics: ELISA, RT-PCR, and RNA Extraction kits. This lateral-flow test meets the WHO performance criteria (sensitivity higher than 80%; specificity higher than 97%) for use in the global fight against COVID-19.

column1: The GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test is intended for the qualitative detection of SARS-CoV-2 Nucleocapsid (N) Protein antigens present in respiratory samples.

GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test

  • GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (NP swab) - CVAG4080A - 20 tests
  • GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal swab) - CVAG4080B - 20 tests

Assay Features

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Easy specimen collection: nasal and nasopharyngeal swabs
  • Fast results in 15 minutes
  • Intuitive visual interpretation
  • High sensitivity and specificity
  • Easy to perform: no special equipment needed
  • CE-IVD marked
GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal swab) for self testing

The GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab) is a single-use test kit intended to detect the presence of the SARS-CoV-2 virus, with self-collected nasal swab specimen from symptomatic individuals who are suspected of being infected with COVID-19. A positive result indicates SARS-CoV-2 antigens present in the specimen.

  • GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal swab) - Prod. No.: CVAG502H05 - 5 tests


Assay Features

  • Current mutant strains can be detected (Alpha, Beta, Gamma, Delta, Omicron)
  • Self-testing format for a high degree of privacy
  • Easy nasal swab specimen collection
  • Fast results in 15 minutes assay time
  • Easy visual interpretation
  • Simple operation, no equipment required
  • Sensitivity: 96.6% / Specificity: 99.4% / Accuracy: 98.2%
  • CE-IVD

• Imprint
  • Legal Notice
  • Privacy Policy
  • General Terms and Conditions

column8: The Gold Standard Diagnostics Group, including Gold Standard Diagnostics Inc, NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH, and VIROTECH Diagnostics GmbH, is a group of specialized diagnostic technologies companies known as well-established providers of innovative solutions in infectious disease testing, immunology and automation.

column1: The instrument catalogue is composed by an innovative suite of platforms that will improve your laboratory efficienty and consistency, and minimize overall costs.
For detailed product information, please visit the http://www.gsdx.us page.

column2:
• Home
  • Products

column3: IVD kits for Human and Veterinary Markets

column8: NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH started out by developing and manufacturing ELISA products for the diagnosis of infectious diseases (NovaLisa)

column1: Over the years, in order to meet the needs and demands of our customers, we found the need to expand our product line outside of the infectious diseases field of expertise.

With that in mind, we started to add new areas of diagnosis into our existing ELISA line. Such as: steroid, protein and thyroid hormones; tumor markers; diabetes monitoring; and circulating immuno complexes.
More recently we have expanded into new areas such as the veterinary and Line blots arena.

We are a very customer oriented company, which drives us to find the right combination of products which give our partners the ability to remain competitors and to meet the challenging needs of their own customers.

column5: <button type=""submit"" name=""search-submit"" class=""c-search__btn   o-btn o-btn--inverted o-btn--raised"">

column11: GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test
Mplex SARS-CoV-2+, Flu A, Flu B (C1) RT-PCR
GSD NovaType Detect + Select K417N SARS-CoV-2
GSD NovaGen SARS-CoV-2 Ag Rapid Test (Nasal Swab for Self Testing)

  • ThunderBolt

column8: The ThunderBolt is an innovative 2-plate, fully automated, open platform that is compact and cost efficient. The user friendly and flexible software is capable of programming a broad range of protocols. The ThunderBolt is available for both ELISA and Chemiluminescent (CLIA) applications.

column1:
Main features:

  • Slide-in racks with positive sample identification
  • Simple workflow software that guides you through the process
  • Designed to suit different laboratory demands
  • High sample loading capacity: 192 primary sample tubes
  • Capable of running many different protocols in a single batch
  • On-board camera allows remote troubleshooting
  • No disposable tips, minimal consumables, direct in-well dilution (up to 1:100)
  • Occupies minimal bench space

Legal Manufacturer: Gold Standard Diagnostics Corp.

• Imprint
  • Legal Notice
  • Privacy Policy
  • General Terms and Conditions

  • AIX1000

column8: The AIX1000 is an FDA cleared, fully automated system for nontreponemal, rapid plasma reagin (RPR) testing. It has been designed to simplify the processing, analysis, result interpretation, and archiving for RPR screens and semi-quantitative titers.

column1:
Main features:

  • RPR screens & titers
  • Up to 192 results in 90 minutes
  • Full sample traceability: positive specimen ID/Tracking
  • Proprietary image recognition algorithm gives objective results
  • Reduced labor overhead: reduced TAT and hands on
  • Easy access to test results: save data and review on demand

Legal Manufacturer: Gold Standard Diagnostics Corp.

• Imprint
  • Legal Notice
  • Privacy Policy
  • General Terms and Conditions

column3: History - Standing the Test of Time

column8: NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH is a medium-sized, ISO certified company, located in Dietzenbach near the Frankfurt International Airport.

column1: NovaTec Immundiagnostica is mainly engaged in the development and manufacturing of ELISA diagnostic kits for both human and veterinary markets. Our main area of focus is infectious diseases. Our kits are used for diagnosis of bacterial, viral and parasitic diseases. NovaTec Immundiagnostica works together with well-known national and international diagnostic companies. Worldwide sales of NovaTec Immundiagnostica products are performed by well-known diagnostic companies and in cooperation with national distributors in over 60 countries.

Production and warehouse have been enlarged, making it possible to produce new assays for our current lines as well as enter into new areas of expertise such as western blots, tumor markers and veterinary.

Advantages of our products are standardized working steps, ready-to-use, color-coded and bar-coded reagents, snap-off microtiter strips and a special IgM buffer to avoid interferences with rheumatoid factor in the specimen.

All ELISA tests have a shelf-life of 15 months after production and can be used manually as well as in fully automated systems. All boxes are recyclable and are shipped within a few days after intake of order.

column3: The right way to do business

column8: Running a business on a day to day presents many challenges and one of them is the challenge to discern what's right from what's wrong; what's good for the long term objective of the company and what's just a short term profit.

column1: Our business claim is "Standing the Test of Time", which shows that our goal, as a  business and a partner is to be here for the long haul. We want to be a solid, reliable and consistent source of products for our business partners. Therefore our decision making process, on a day to day, never deviates from this main goal and its core idea.

Our partners can count on us to keep delivering what we promise, and to keep meeting their needs and demands over and over. NovaTec Immundiagnostica will continue to stay in business, standing the test of time, overcoming the challenges and innovating the market.

We continue to expand our facilities. We moved our corporate office into a new building, right next to our laboratory facility. The new space gives us the ability to continue to expand and to hire new personal to better assist the needs and demands of our customers and of our market.
We believe this new team will give us the edge we need to get to our next level as a company.

NovaTec Immundiagnostica GmbH started out as a family business where everyone's opinion matter. The company has grown and expanded beyond the family walls, however it has not changed its corporate philosophy. Everyone matters, everyone contributes, everyone grows...

Our management team works very closely with all our staff, from product development all the way through production, marketing, customer service and product delivery. Our goal is to provide immediate responses to our customers needs and demands.

Our management structure is very horizontal, which gives us the ability to act quickly and to make decisions in a timely manner. That allows us to work closely with our partners in a flexible and proactive way.

column8: NovaTec Immundiagnostica has a certified Quality Management System according to  DIN EN ISO 13485. An annual audit is implemented by mdc. All products made by NovaTec are CE-marked and fulfill all the requirements of the IVD guideline of the European Union 98/79/EC of Oct. 27th 1998.

column1: We pride ourselves to keep the highest level of internal quality assurance so our customers can have piece of mind when ordering our products.

We strongly believe that in order to have a quality product one must have quality people working behind it and that's exactly what we strive on. Our staff consists of very qualified and experienced professionals who focus on delivering high quality products to the end user.

As always, we continue to participate in Ringtrail studies such as INSTAND and NEQAS. Those studies are part of our overall Quality Control Protocol and gives our customers an extra assurance that our products are in accordance with the quality standards of well known and respected institutions such as the ones above.

column8: Today's economy presents many obstacles and challenges for one to run a successful business. The World is only getting smaller and the globalization process of our economy is shrinking the boarders and presenting new challenges everyday.

column1: Growing a business isn't easy and without the right partners it becomes impossible. Each market presents its own challenges and uniquenesses. Trying to penetrate a market without the expertise and knowledge of a local partner is dangerous and ineffective. In order to remain competitive and to keep the same level of great customer service and product quality, NovaTec Immundiagnostica relies on its local partners to reach the global market.

We believe that a strong partnership is the secret for a successful strategy to grow a business and to meet the needs and demands of the end users. We have been developing partnerships for several years and so far we have been blessed by finding right partners and we are very pleased with the accomplishments of our distributors. Without their help we would not be able to successfully reach our goals.

For many years we have been working together with worldwide market leaders such as Siemens and DiaSorin. We also have a long list of local partners representing our products in most countries around the world. Please contact us in case you are interested in becoming one of our partners or if you need the contact information for our partner in your country.
